title: Google\Cloud\Video\LiveStream\V1\SegmentSettings
name: SegmentSettings
description:
Segment settings for fmp4 and ts.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.SegmentSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.segment_duration
params.description: Duration of the segments in seconds. The default is 6s. Note that segmentDuration must be greater than or equal to [gop_duration][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.VideoStream.H264CodecSettings.gop_duration], and segmentDuration must be divisible by [gop_duration][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.VideoStream.H264CodecSettings.gop_duration]. Valid range is [2s, 20s]. All [mux_streams][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.Manifest.mux_streams] in the same manifest must have the same segment duration.

methods.name: getSegmentDuration
methods.description:
Duration of the segments in seconds. The default is 6s. Note that segmentDuration must be greater than or equal to [gop_duration][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.VideoStream.H264CodecSettings.gop_duration], and segmentDuration must be divisible by [gop_duration][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.VideoStream.H264CodecSettings.gop_duration].

Valid range is [2s, 20s]. All [mux_streams][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.Manifest.mux_streams] in the same manifest must have the same segment duration.
